Uses of Class
stats.Statistics

  • Packages that use Statistics 
    Package Description
    ManageTasks  
    stats  
    tasks  

    • Uses of Statistics in ManageTasks

      Methods in ManageTasks that return types with arguments of type Statistics 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<Statistics> TaskListController.stats(java.lang.String field)
      Restituisce le statistiche per l'attributo richiesto (in formato JsonArray) Se non si specifica il field il valore di default è "tipologia"

    • Uses of Statistics in stats

      Subclasses of Statistics in stats 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DoubleStatistics 
      class  IntegerStatistics 
      Fields in stats with type parameters of type Statistics 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected java.util.List<Statistics> StatCalculator.result
      La lista contenente i risultati del calcolo
      Methods in stats that return types with arguments of type Statistics 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<Statistics> StatCalculator.getResults()
      Restituisce i risultati (Nel caso di numeri la lista avrà un solo elemento)

    • Uses of Statistics in tasks

      Methods in tasks that return types with arguments of type Statistics 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.util.List<Statistics> TaskList.calc(java.lang.String alias)
      Calcola le statistiche sul campo (colonna dei dati) passato sotto il suo alias
